# =================================================
#                    Without Docker
# =================================================
name: CI-CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ "main" ]

jobs:
  # Build job
  build:
    name: Build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.11"

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -r requirements.txt
          pip install pytest  # pytest installed for next job

  # Test job
  test:
    name: Run Tests
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: build   # Runs only if build succeeds

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.11"

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -r requirements.txt
          pip install pytest

      - name: Run pytest
        run: |
          python -m pytest tests/ --maxfail=1 --disable-warnings -q

  # Deploy job
  deploy:
    name: Deploy to Render
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: test   # Runs only if test job succeeds
    permissions:
      deployments: write

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Deploy using Render Action
        uses: JorgeLNJunior/render-deploy@v1.4.6
        with:
          service_id: ${{ secrets.RENDER_SERVICE_ID }}
          api_key: ${{ secrets.RENDER_API_KEY }}
          deployment_environment: 'production'
